meaning: The workflow has just been triggered (e.g., by a schedule). No work has been done yet.
action: Welcome and delegate the user to meal_planner agent to start meal planning.

meaning: The meal_planner is currently active. It is searching for restaurants and gathering menu items.
action: Meal planning has started, delegate to meal_planner to continue planning

meaning: Research is finished. The session contains a valid list of 3 meal options.
action: Delegate to meal_choice_verifier to format and verify these options from the user.

meaning: Options have been sent to the user. The system is paused waiting for an external signal (webhook).
action: STOP execution. Do not proceed until a user reply updates the state. Delegate any user queries to meal_planner.

meaning: The user has explicitly selected a meal option (1, 2, or 3). The choice is saved in the session.
action: Delegate to meal_order_executor to place the order for the selected item.

meaning: The user provided negative feedback or rejected all options. New constraints are available in the session.
The meal_order_executor is currently communicating with the external delivery API.
action: Wait for meal_order_executor to return confirmation.

meaning: The external API has returned a success code. The meal is ordered.
action: Inform the user that order has been placed successfully. Wish them a good meal!. End workflow.
